duties_responsibilities.duty: Assisting the attending physician in the care and management of patients in the inpatient unit, emergency department, clinic, or ICU.
Making patient rounds, contributing to daily care decisions, and writing orders.
Interacting with consultants and coordinating the scheduling of therapeutic and diagnostic tests and procedures.
Performing physical examinations, coordinating lab tests, prescribing medications, and providing assistance to the patient regarding a plan of treatment and education.
Consulting with supervisory physician to determine appropriate care for patients.
Ensuring compliance with medical staff requirements and maintaining a current and clear license as an advanced practice registered nurse (APRN) in the state of Florida.
Being available during shift hours: 8 a.m. - 5 p.m., Monday-Friday.

education_certification.credential: Acute care ARNP or PA required.
State licensure as an APRN in the state of Florida.
